titleStmt.title: America: or An exact description of the West-Indies: more especially of those provinces which are under the dominion of the King of Spain. / Faithfully represented by N.N. gent.
titleStmt.author: N. N.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Ric. Hodgkinsonne for Edw. Dod, and are to be sold at the Gun in Ivy-lane.,

notesStmt.note: "America: the second part. Containing the topographicall description of the several provinces, both of the northern and southern part" has separate title page; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
